basics.name: Tran Nguyen Ky Duyen
basics.summary: I write code on stage in front of a crowd. With 5+ years of experience in full-stack software development, I aim to teach and inspire thousands of developers to build cool things with code. I enjoy sparking the imagination of developers and helping them build deep experiences with technology. I'm interested in applying creativity to software engineering, public speaking, advocating for the developer community, creating technical content and storytelling, improving developer experiences, contributing to open-source software, and influencing teams to build great products.

work.name: BCM Solutions Agency
highlights: Composed engaging and informative social media posts, PR posts and SEO content for prominent brands such as VietJet Airline, Hanoi BOLD & Light, Toshiba Lifestyle, Ricola, ATOME, Habeco, Khánh Hòa Nutrifood, and Sacombank.

work.name: PHUM Studio
highlights: Developed shooting concepts and assisted the production team in the shoot for PHYSIOGEL, TOPSMARKET, Pierre Cardin, ICONDENIM.

community.name: Code and Coffee
community.description: Software community for developers by developers
highlights: Organized Seattle's Code and Coffee chapter, a community for developers by developers.

community.name: Twilo Seattle Meetup
highlights: Organized Twilio's first meetup group in Seattle.
Teach hundreds of developers how to build projects with Twilio.

writing.name: KAMALA Beauty Spa and Clinic
highlights: Publicized 25 social posts and co-designed 5 posts, which led to 1,543 Facebook reach and 522 likes.

writing.name: Tá Lã House
highlights: Wrote 10 social posts and assisted co-writers in generating content. Designed 7+ posts and co-designed 5 posts. Resulted in 344 Facebook reach, 159 likes, and 163 followers.

writing.name: TVCreate 2022
highlights: Conceptualized topics and delivered 30 social posts, which increased audience interactions by 15% compared to previous years.

filming.name: Music Video Như Là Mer
highlights: Conceptualized Director's Treatment and directed the production team throughout the shoot. Reached 22K views on Youtube.

filming.name: PSA Vui không khó dễ, đời mới nể
highlights: Conceived and directed the plot. Resulted in Nomination for Best TVC/PSA at 2022 Hoa Sen EOS.

filming.name: Podcast series Người trong ngành bàn về dằm trong nghề
highlights: Generated script guidelines and directed the production process. Reached 1,373 total views on Youtube.

filming.name: Short film Đường về
highlights: Monitored the continuity of the shoot, kept every details of written and photographic records of each scene. Won Best Film at 2022 Hoa Sen EOS.

filming.name: Performing Art MV All of me
highlights: Assisted the director in conceptualizing script and script guidelines. Got nominated for Best MV at 2022 Hoa Sen EOS.

filming.name: Short film Cù Ngơ
highlights: Developed storyline with the director and wrote script. Represented for Class of 2019 to be screened on 2021 Hoa Sen EOS.
Relevant coursework: Audio and Video Techniques, TVC Production, Copywriting, IMC, Media Project and Management, Media Strategy, and Tactics

awards.name: Top 10 Zalo AI Challenge
highlights: Led a team of four to solve the challenge of aligning lyrics to music audio using machine learning techniques.
Designed and implemented a system that separated vocals from the audio, extracted acoustic features, and applied the CTC segmentation algorithm.

awards.name: Top 1% VNUHCM Academic Performance Test
awards.organizer: Vietnam National University Ho Chi Minh City
highlights: Achieved outstanding results in an academic performance test administered by VNUHCM, placing in the top 1% among over 40,000 participants in Vietnam.
Demonstrated proficiency in a range of competencies, including linguistic ability, mathematics, data analysis, logical thinking, and problem-solving.

awards.name: 7.5 IELTS
highlights: 8.5 Reading & 8.5 Listening

awards.name: Top 27% Australian Mathematics Competition
highlights: Placed in the top 27% of New Zealand's Intermediate division in a prestigious international mathematics competition with over 600,000 participants from 38 different countries.
Demonstrated proficiency in problem-solving across various mathematical domains, including algebra, geometry, statistics, and probability.

certificates.name: Deep Learning Specialization
highlights: Completed  a 5-course program taught by Andrew Ng, focused on developing deep learning models in computer vision and natural language processing and utilizing industry best practices.
Built and applied deep learning models, including CNNs, RNNs, and Transformers to solve problems such as visual detection, recognition, and question-answering. [TensorFlow, NumPy]

certificates.name: Harvard CS50 Introduction to AI
highlights: Explored the concepts and algorithms behind modern AI and machine learning, including graph search algorithms, classification, optimization, and reinforcement learning.
Designed intelligent agents for games like Minesweeper and Tic Tac Toe as part of practical experience gained with machine learning libraries and theoretical knowledge.

projects.name: TwilioQuest Extension
projects.summary: Built a mission in TwilioQuest, Twilio's educational video game, to attract and teach developers how to use Twilio at tech events. The mission includes coding challenges for players, conversations with NPCs, Twilio API missions, and more. It was built with Phaser.js and Tiled.

projects.name: Summarize Text from Images
projects.summary: Developed a Python app that performs text recognition on photos then sends you a message with a summary. It uses the Google Cloud Vision API to detect text in images, OpenAI to generate a summary of the text, and the Twilio SMS API to alert users.

projects.name: Do You Like Scary Movies?
projects.summary: Created a serverless web app that spooks users by re-creating a famous scene from the movie Scream. Built with low-code tools and serveless functions, it's a fun application to share during Halloween.

projects.name: NBA News on Demand
projects.summary: Built a demo app in Python using the Twilio SMS API to send users on-demand NBA news. It's meant to guide beginners to send and receive incoming messages using Twilio.

projects.name: JSON Resume using LinkedIn
projects.summary: Customized a chrome extension to parse data from a LinkedIn profile, generate a custom JSON file, transform the data using a Python script, and build an online resume (hosted on Firebase). Developed and packaged multiple themes on NPM and GitHub Registry. Also created a subdomain name to point to this Firebase function.

projects.name: www.AnthonyDellavecchia.com
projects.summary: Developed a website using a static-site generator, Hugo, and a custom domain name for my personal brand. It's deployed and hosted on Firebase & GitHub. It's integrated with my JSON resume project, so you can select a theme and view my resume.

projects.name: Automated Job Scraping
projects.summary: Developed a server-side script with Node.js that automatically searches and scrapes data of job postings from select company websites, then sends a notification to the user.
